value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|If only we knew where to find
Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Do you really believe that he's dead?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I... I think we should follow Prince
Bruno.$k$p$EFace_Anger|We last saw him in the World of
Shadows. He may still be there.$k$pOnly he knows the truth. And if he did
kill Zacharias...that is an act I cannot
forgive.$k$p

$WmMPID_デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Finally! I was getting bored waiting
around for you. I hope you're better at
fighting than figuring out where to go!$k$pMy name's Delthea. I hope you aren't
thinking of underestimating me just
because I'm so darn cute.$k$pThat would be a big mistake. My
magic will blow you off the battlefield.
So, who's first?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Ugh...argh...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Ha... Hee-hee... Hah!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Prince Bruno!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Haha... You finally made it. Good. I'm
tired of waiting!$k$pAlfonse! Sharena! I'm going to gut
you...for starters.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Can you get me before I get you?
Zacharias is crying out for
vengeance! Bwa-ha-ha!$k$p$Sbs150|
